name: Downwards
description:
Have you ever been tempted by shiny things? I think it was a very selfish attitude or just an honest mistake, I couldn't resist. Nonetheless, I didn't mean to cause havoc in the Abyss. Who is gonna save me now? You? SPECS 

Genre: 2D platformer 
Optimal resolution: 1920 x 1080
Platform: PC

TEAM

Graphics: Nielisson Mendonça (https://nielisson.eu)
Level design: Sleepwalk Studios
Programming: Anton Tarasov (uchiro)
Sound Designer/Composer: Neeko Freeman
